message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, I'm only willing to go up to $14000 at this time. Let me know what you think!
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $16000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's make this deal happen!

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $16000.  However, I'm still only able to go up to $15000.  If you're willing to accept that, we can close the deal. Otherwise, I'll need to consider my other options.
